action.content:
You are an applicant in a job interview. Here is a description of your CV:

WHAT: Job Application
BACHELOR: Informatics
INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE: One year
HIGHEST-EDUCATION: PostDoc
OTHER-SKILLS: Dancing
AVAILABILITY: In two weeks

The recruiter does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the recruiter will start with RECRUITER. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <some text>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <some text>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
ME:  Has the recruiter been informed about the field of your bachelor? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for BACHELOR valid after 1 tries.
ME:  If I asked the recruiter how long you have been working in the industry, would he or she know the answer? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE valid after 1 tries.
ME:  Do you think the recruiter knows your latest academic level? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for HIGHEST-EDUCATION valid after 1 tries.
ME:  Is the recruiter aware of your other skills? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for OTHER-SKILLS valid after 1 tries.
ME:  Has the recruiter been informed about your availability? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for AVAILABILITY valid after 1 tries.
For how long have you been working in the industry?
RECRUITER: For how long have you been working in the industry? Answer only this question in one short sentence and then stop.
ANSWER: One year. I recently completed my PostDoc and am eager to apply my skills and knowledge in a full-time role.
One year. I recently completed my PostDoc and am eager to apply my skills and knowledge in a full-time role.
Value for HIGHEST-EDUCATION anticipated; ground truth turn updated from 4 to 0.
One year. I recently completed my PostDoc and am eager to apply my skills and knowledge in a full-time role.

Answer for BACHELOR valid after 1 tries.
ME:  Have you told the interviewer about the years of your experience in the industry? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE valid after 1 tries.
ME:  Have you informed the recruiter about your latest academic degree? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for HIGHEST-EDUCATION valid after 1 tries.

Answer for OTHER-SKILLS valid after 1 tries.
ME:  Have you informed the interviewer about your dates? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for AVAILABILITY valid after 1 tries.
RECRUITER: What was your bachelor course? Answer only this question in one short sentence and then stop.

ANSWER: Informatics, which provided me with a strong foundation in computer science and information technology. It equipped me with valuable problem-solving and analytical skills that I believe will be beneficial for this position.

Informatics, which provided me with a strong foundation in computer science and information technology. It equipped me with valuable problem-solving and analytical skills that I believe will be beneficial for this position.

Answer for AVAILABILITY valid after 1 tries.
RECRUITER: What is your availability? Answer only this question in one short sentence and then stop.
ME:  Does the interviewer know what you have studied in your bachelor? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for BACHELOR valid after 1 tries.

Answer for OTHER-SKILLS valid after 1 tries.
ME:  Has the recruiter been informed about your availability? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for AVAILABILITY valid after 1 tries.
Please tell me what other skills you have.
RECRUITER: Please tell me what other skills you have. Answer only this question in one short sentence and then stop.

ANSWER: Aside from my technical expertise, I also enjoy dancing and believe it showcases my creativity, discipline, and ability to work well in teams. It has taught me the importance of dedication and precision, which are qualities that I carry into my professional life as well.

What academic level have you achieved?
RECRUITER: What academic level have you achieved? Answer only this question in one short sentence and then stop.

ANSWER: Postdoctoral level. My research focused on [Provide a brief description of your research area]. This experience enhanced my critical thinking, problem-solving, and independent research skills. It also allowed me to develop strong communication skills through presenting my work at conferences and publishing in peer-reviewed journals. I believe this demonstrates my ability to contribute meaningfully to your organization's research and development initiatives.
